name: Engraved [qqTimer]
description: With a skillfully engraved timer, this qqTimer theme looks absolutely phenomenal.
additional_info:
Just install the theme, and everything will be set automatically!

Change Log:

=== v1.0 ===

- The first stable release of this theme is finally here!

- Changes: Improved compatibility, bug fixes

- Minimum supported resolution is still 800x600

=== v0.5 (Beta) ===

- This theme is still in the experimental stage. If you find any bugs in this theme, please report to me immediately. Thanks!

- The minimum supported resolution is 800x600.

- qqTimer's internal theme settings will not work with this theme.



Enjoy!

- ArneshRC
